title: I haven't been getting autofill protection after being autofilled lately
body:
You're supposed to get it after you are autofilled or play support. When I get autofilled, I don't get protection. Help?

I get it for playing support but not for being autofilled.

replies.body: Most of the time autofill is only enabled during high queue times when it may take you forever to actually get a match with your roles. Just because you play a support or get your chosen role in the previous match, it doesn't mean that you're prevented from getting autofilled again. Be sure to check up on all the details about the [**new champion select**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207267266-New-Champion-Select#h3q6)!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gMGqsddf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-11T02:06:42.523+0000)
>
> Just because you play a support or get your chosen role in the previous match, it doesn't mean that you're prevented from getting autofilled again.

I'm confused, this is from the link you posted

"Autofill is never active during your promo series, **and you won't be selected to autofill two games in a row.**"

So you should not get autofilled twice in a row.

While you might be autofilled here and there, and I have seen it happen for one or two games in a row as well, but definitely not constantly in every game. You may have run into some kind of weird bug, and I'd encourage you to post this in the report a bug board as well!

> Most of the time autofill is only enabled during high queue times

FYI Autofill is never turned off on the OCE server
